resources.string: Make the most of your paycheck.
Free service, just enter a 4 digit code to get started.
Pay with your paycheck - before till after payday - to stretch it out and keep more of your money.

Takehome makes it easy to manage your paycheck. Using a simple formula, it keeps tab of the bottom line while you list the payments you intend to make. Start a free account today. Here is how you can benefit:
Determine cash on hand by listing out the bills that are due.
Workout several scenarios and see how far the paycheck can go.
Evaluate bill payment strategies based on due dates and amounts due.
Manage paycheck and play with payment allocations
